name: Length of the acknowledgement area in rear of the required level
resolution: 10 cm, 1m or 10 m depends on Q_SCALE

name: Length of the acknowledgement area in rear of the start of the required mode
resolution: 10 cm, 1m or 10 m depends on Q_SCALE

name: Length of reduced adhesion
description: Length for which the reduced adhesion factor apply.
resolution: 10 cm, 1 m or 10 m depending on Q_SCALE

name: Length of speed restriction due to Axle load
resolution: 10 cm, 1m or 10 m depending on Q_SCALE

name: Over-reading error
description: L_DOUBTOVER is the difference between the lower bound of the confidence interval and the estimated value of D_LRBG
resolution: 10 cm, 1m or 10 m depends on Q_SCALE

name: Under-reading error
description: L_DOUBTUNDER is the difference between the upper bound of the confidence interval and the estimated value of D_LRBG
resolution: 10 cm, 1m or 10 m depends on Q_SCALE

name: Length of the End section in the MA
resolution: 10 cm, 1m or 10 m depends on Q_SCALE.

name: Length of loop
description: The EOLM specifies the length of the loop starting from the distance indicated by D_LOOP
resolution: 10 cm, 1m or 10 m depends on Q_SCALE

name: Length of the area of the required mode
resolution: 10 cm, 1m or 10 m depending on Q_SCALE

name: Message length
description: L_MESSAGE indicates the length of the message in bytes, including all packets and all variables defined in the message header (NID_MESSAGE and L_MESSAGE also).
resolution: 1 Byte

name: Packet length
description: L_PACKET indicates the length of the packet in bits, including all bits of the packet header
resolution: 1 bit

name: Length of the reversing permitted area
resolution: 10 cm, 1m or 10 m depends on Q_SCALE

name: Length of section in the MA
resolution: 10 cm, 1m or 10 m depends on Q_SCALE

name: Length on which a track ahead free request shall be displayed
resolution: 10 cm, 1m or 10 m depends on Q_SCALE

name: Length of text string
description: L_TEXT defines the length of a text string (L_TEXT * X_TEXT)
resolution: 1 Text String Element

name: Length on which a text shall be displayed
resolution: 10 cm, 1m or 10 m depends on Q_SCALE

spec.32767: The display of the text shall not be distance limited.

name: Length for which the defined track condition is valid
resolution: 10 cm, 1m or 10 m depending on Q_SCALE

name: Train length
description: This is the absolute real length of the train.
resolution: 1 m

name: Safe Train length
resolution: 1 m

name: Length of the temporary speed restriction
resolution: 10 cm, 1m or 10 m depends on Q_SCALE
